thread.title: Salves will be Showcasing KWizCom’s Solutions at the Unity Connect Amsterdam 2015
thread.title_full: Salves will be Showcasing KWizCom’s Solutions at the Unity Connect Amsterdam 2015

author: Sara Jhangiryan
title: Salves will be Showcasing KWizCom’s Solutions at the Unity Connect Amsterdam 2015
text:
KWizCom, a leading developer of SharePoint Forms & Mobile Solution , as well as multiple other turn-key SharePoint web parts and add-ons designed to expand Microsoft SharePoint, is pleased to announce that Salves, the company’s leading partner in The Netherlands, will be showcasing KWizCom’s products and solutions at the upcoming Unity Connect Amsterdam conference, taking place at the Meervaart Theatre in Amsterdam on October 12 -13, 2015. Unity Connects brings together the SharePoint, Office 365 & Azure communities, along with the best & brightest European and international experts in the area to provide delegates everything they need to succeed while working with SharePoint on-premises, Office 365 and anything in between.
“Joining forces with KWizCom gives us the advantage in making SharePoint and Office 365 easier to use for our customers," says Emile Stam, the Director of Salves.
The conference attendees are encouraged to visit booth # 12, where they will be able to familiarize themselves with the solutions and add-ons both companies offer, as well as get the exciting opportunity to ride the company’s simulator.
“It is our greatest honor to have Salves, our leading Dutch partner, to represent KWizCom at the Unity Connect conference in Amsterdam and showcase our add-ons and solutions”, says Nimrod Geva, the Product Group Manager at KWizCom.
This conference will incorporate world’s best speakers from the industry, a vivacious community of SharePoint professionals, business leaders, developers and end users. For more details on the conference, please visit: http://www.unityconnect.com/amsterdam
About Salves
Salves Business Productivity, Gold Certified Microsoft Partner on Cloud Productivity and Content & Collaboration, is headquartered in Helvoirt, The Netherlands. Salves was founded in 2006 and the company’s key competences incorporate Test Consultancy, Software Development, HR implementation and Microsoft Consultancy. They focus on leveraging existing and future solutions, search for distinctive innovations, challenge existing ways of working and always aim on achieving maximum business productivity for their customers. Please visit http://www.businessproductivity.nl to find out more about Salves.
About KWizCom Corporation
Since 2005, KWizCom has provided innovative solutions and services to make SharePoint even better for over 5,000 companies worldwide. KWizCom's solutions and services expand Microsoft SharePoint out-of-the-box capabilities, streamline workflow, maximize efficiency and enhance over-all productivity for hundreds of thousands of users. KWizCom, a Gold Certified Microsoft Partner, is headquartered in Toronto, Canada. Please visit http://www.kwizcom.com to find out more about KWizCom's clients, people, partners and solutions.
